This is a train ride from BolquÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨re Eyne to Latour-de-Carol as one of two parts
of a ride from Villefranche-de-Conflent to Latour-de-Carol.

The German TV (ARD) broadcasts once in while during nighttimes short section
of trainrides like this featuring the most beautiful tracks in the world. 
It seems they just try to fill some gaps in there timeline. So it happens, 
that sometimes a section is suddenly postponed or withdrawn, when other films
needed the transmitting time. 

Unfortunately it happened here too: the last ten minutes are missing. But you
may get them in a slightly lower quality from jdylan in avi on Pirate Bay:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4356092/Die_schoen_Bahnstrecken_-_Drivers-eye" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4356092/Die_schoen_Bahnstrecken_-_Drivers-eye</a>
_Trains_-_France_02_Italy_0

I catch as much sections I can get using Windows Media Center recording in its
special format dvr-ms, cut and put them together with DVREdit. Then I convert
the file lossless to mpg (filesize is almost identical) since I think, it is
the most popular format everybody can handle.

Hope, you have fun with my CabRide-torrents.
